entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -36.9°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
